scripts.web:rebuild: docker-compose rm -s -v -f web_explorer && docker-compose up -d --build web_explorer
scripts.api:rebuild: docker-compose rm -s -v -f api_explorer && docker-compose up -d --build api_explorer
scripts.web:restart: docker-compose stop web_explorer && docker-compose up -d web_explorer
scripts.api:restart: docker-compose stop api_explorer && docker-compose up -d api_explorer
scripts.start:dev: npm run api:rebuild && npm run web:rebuild
scripts.restart: npm run api:restart && npm run web:restart
